sql.name: form.group
sql.item: select sysgroup.C630000018 as groupname,sysgroup.C1 as groupid from {100} sysgroup where sysgroup.C630000021=2 and sysgroup.C630000020<>0

sql.name: form.department
sql.item: select sysgroup.C630000018 as groupname,sysgroup.C1 as groupid from {100} sysgroup where sysgroup.C630000021=3

sql.name: form.formtype
sql.item: select t.C650000001 as groupname,'t'||ars.SCHEMAID as groupid from ARSCHEMA ars,{100} t where ars.name=t.C650000002

sql.name: form.interfacetype
sql.item: select case t.C630000003 when 'HWWGNMC' then '话务网管' when 'DLWGNMC' then '动力网管' else '数据网管' end as groupname, t.C1 as groupid from {100} t where t.C630000003 in ('HWWGNMC','DLWGNMC','SJWGNMC')

sql.name: form.formtype1
sql.item: select t.C650000001 as groupname,'t'||ars.SCHEMAID as groupid from ARSCHEMA ars,{100} t where ars.name=t.C650000002
